titleStmt.title: Hosannah: a Thanksgiving-sermon, June 28th. 1660. By J. M. Presb. Anglic.
titleStmt.author: Martin, John, 1619-1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hall, for Rich. Davis,

notesStmt.note: A sermon printed, but never preached owing to a lack of a pulpit. Cf. Madan.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob 22"; "Jo Martin" is written beneath 'By J. M.' on title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
